The answer to the original query is to manually search for a laptop with 8GB RAM that has good graphics for gaming, selecting a laptop from a reputable brand, such as Dell, MSI, Acer, Asus, HP, or Razer. 
It is important to check the specifications of any recommended laptops before making a decision to ensure they meet all the required needs and any other relevant factors, such as budget.

Here is a list of laptop models that fit your requirement of being below INR 30,000, along with their specifications: 
 1. MIC066 Microsoft Model 66 - Intel Core i3, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6-inch FHD, 12 hour battery life 
2. MSI090 MSI Model 90 - Intel Core i3, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 14-inch FHD, 8 hour battery life 
3. HP068 HP Model 68 - Intel Core i3, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 17-inch FHD, 10 hour battery life 
These laptops are all within your budget and provide the desired specifications. Ultimately, the final decision depends on your personal needs and preferences.

1. Lenovo IdeaPad 130 - A great option if you're looking for a lightweight laptop that lasts a long time on a single charge and is very portable, making it a great student laptop. 
2. Acer Aspire 5 - A versatile laptop that is built with an AMD Ryzen 5 processor, which is known for its superior multi-tasking capabilities. 
3. Dell Inspiron 3501 - A balanced choice due to its combination of processing power and graphics performance, and can even handle some casual gaming. 

All of these laptops are excellent options for under Rs. 30,000, and you can't go wrong with either of them.

The 5 best laptops with good battery life are the Microsoft Model 56, Acer Model 6, Dell Model 9, Microsoft Model 11, and Acer Model 93. These laptops have battery lives ranging from 6 hours to 12 hours and are equipped with Intel or AMD processors, along with varying storage capacities.
